summary: When a magical butterfly kisses the kind princess, Kara, the crime-fighting hero, Super Sparkle, emerges. Now, along with her strong cousin, they must deal with the Baron, the kingdom's real enemy. Will the super-girls teach him a lesson?
cast: Kelly Sheridan|Britt Irvin|Michael Kopsa|Rebecca Husain|Chelsea Miller|Kira Tozer|Patricia Drake|Michael Adamthwaite|David Kaye|Alyssya Swales|Gabe Khouth|Tabitha St. Germain|Kathleen Barr|Brian Drummond|Michael Daingerfield|Adam Pateman|Brady Roberts|Nevada Brandt|Eden Gamliel
